      • handleLoadChange

        public static void handleLoadChange(org.bukkit.block.Sign sign,
                                    boolean loaded)
        Handles a change in the loaded change of a sign. Sign Actions bound to this sign will have their loadedChanged(SignActionEvent, boolean) called.
        Parameters:
        sign - that was loaded/unloaded
        loaded - state change

        Handles right-click interaction with a Sign
        Parameters:
        clickedSign - that was right-clicked
        player - that clicked
        Returns:
        Whether the click was handled (and the original interaction should be cancelled)

      • verify

        public boolean verify(SignActionEvent info)
        Verifies that a SignActionEvent covers a valid TrainCarts sign. If you have a sign format that differs greatly from the TC format, override this method. This function is called before handling sign building and sign action execution.
        Parameters:
        info - input event
        Returns:
        True if valid, False if not

      • match

        public abstract boolean match(SignActionEvent info)
        Checks whether a sign action event is meant for this type of Sign Action
        Parameters:
        info - event
        Returns:
        True if it matched, False if not

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(SignActionEvent info)
        Fired when this sign is being executed for a certain event
        Parameters:
        info - event

      • build

        public abstract boolean build(SignChangeActionEvent event)
        Fired when a sign is being built
        Parameters:
        event - containing relevant Build information
        Returns:
        True if building is allowed, False if not

      • destroy

        public void destroy(SignActionEvent info)
        Handles the post-destroy logic for when this sign is broken
        Parameters:
        info - related to the destroy event

      • loadedChanged

        public void loadedChanged(SignActionEvent info,
                          boolean loaded)
        Called when a sign becomes loaded (after placement or chunk loads), or unloaded (destroyed or when chunk unloads)
        Parameters:
        info - for the sign
        loaded - state the sign changed to

        Handles a player right-clicking this action sign
        Parameters:
